subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Joaquín Rodríguez of Spain took the overall lead in the Giro d’Italia from Ryder Hesjedal of Canada after winning a hilly stage with a sprint finish.
snippet: Joaquín Rodríguez of Spain took the overall lead in the Giro d’Italia from Ryder Hesjedal of Canada after winning a hilly stage with a sprint finish.
